TIPS.MSG: Remember: Using 3rd-Party Programs is not allowed!
Swapping is not allowed and will result in a permanent ban or character deletion.
Thanks for playing, you guys are what Freestyle GunZ is!
Why don't you tell your friends about FGunZ? Together you could make a Clan!
Do you use a router? Try port forwarding to experience optimized network play.
Is GunZ running slow on your computer? Use the optimization feature in the Options menu.
Never give your password to anyone! The administrators will never ask you for your password!
Harassment (persistently stalking or attacking a player through whispers) is not allowed.
You can try all donation items for FREE via our website http://fgunz.net/
